Pre-Game Insights: Washington travels to San Antonio looking to stop its three-game road losing streak.
Miscellaneous Highlights: San Antonio went 22-60 overall with a 12-29 record at home during the 2023-24 season.
The Spurs gave up 118.6 points per game while committing 17.2 fouls last season.
Washington finished 15-67 overall with an 8-33 record on the road a season ago.
The Wizards shot 47.0% from the field and 34.8% from 3-point range last season.
Others: The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.

Injuries for both teams include: Spurs: Malaki Branham: day to day (ankle), Tre Jones: out (ankle), Jeremy Sochan: out (thumb). Wizards: Saddiq Bey: out (knee), Malcolm Brogdon: out (thumb), Richaun Holmes: day to day (illness).
